code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{onShowLogin,onShowRegister}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleShowLogin=()=>{if(onShowLogin){onShowLogin();}else{navigate('/login');}};const handleShowRegister=()=>{if(onShowRegister){onShowRegister();}else{navigate('/register');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-brand",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"EthioSoft Marketplace"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleShowLogin,className:"nav-btn login-btn",children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleShowRegister,className:"nav-btn register-btn",children:"Get Started"})]})]})});};export default Header;
